## Bio  
Dr. Jos√© Carlos del Valle is a PhD in Biology that work at the Universityof Seville (Spain). His research has been mainly focused on the importance of non-pollinator mediated selection through the study of flavonoid accumulation in reproductive and vegetative tissues of plants and its implication for plant success in challenging ecosystems. Nevertheless, he has been conducting other research in several topics within the field of Evolutionary Biology, including the study of flower color polymorphism, population genetic and phylogeographic studies.
